space.arim.api.chat

Class ComponentBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.arim.api.chat.ComponentBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentFramework, space.arim.universal.util.Stringable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Component.Builder, JsonComponentBuilder

    public class ComponentBuilder
extends Object
implements ComponentFramework
    Helper class for creating individual components.
    Author:
    A248
